properties.name: url
properties.description: The URL of the page when the event was triggered.

properties.name: userId
properties.description: The ID of the user that triggered the event.

properties.name: teamId
properties.description: The ID of the team that triggered the event.

properties.name: plan
properties.description: The plan of the team that triggered the event.

page_view.name: Page View
page_view.description: Triggered when a user views a page.

properties.name: page name
properties.description: The name of the page that was viewed.
